page.title: 03HOME LIFE IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: 07.00 Mum gets up. 07.20 I get up (not wanting to)- go down stairs. 07.25 Have breakfast (cereal, toast, and tea) 07.40 Brush my teeth(Colgate-new pump dispenser)Wash my face and hands. 07.45 Brush my hair whilst watching T.V. a.m. 08.25 Put on coat and shoes, call for friend, call at shop for lolly & polos 09.00 School starts. 12.30 break for lunch( meat and potatoes) 13.15 school resumes. 15.15 school finishes- badminton practice. 16.30 go home for tea (sausages, beans, potatoes) 17.30 watch T.V. 22.00 have supper and go to bed.
